title: A local branch of the national ACM
description: We focus on bringing interesting speakers to campus, holding fun competitions and educational events.

title: Open to all UMass Lowell students, faculty, and staff
description: Want to learn more about Computer Science? Join us at our biweekly meetings to learn, build, and connect.

title: Meetings
description: Learn more about our CS community through guest lectures, workshops, and networking events

title: Membership
description: Membership to the national ACM includes access to ACM's Digital Library and exclusive career opportunities.

title: Special Interest Groups
description: Special Interest Groups share expertise and research in a wide variety of computing disciplines.

title: Publications
description: ACM publishes new ideas and work each year through its magazines, journals, books, and conferences
